prompt: Dame un juguete de este personaje

structured_prompt.short_description: A stylized toy figure of a character with a square, LED-faced head, wearing a blue jacket and jeans. The toy is posed with one arm raised, making a rude gesture, and is displayed on a clean, minimalist shelf against a soft, light blue wall. The scene is designed to showcase the toy as a collectible item.

objects.description: A collectible toy figure, approximately 10 inches tall, replicating the character from the reference image. It has a square head with an LED-like display showing an angry, pixelated face with white eyes and a jagged mouth. The body is wearing a miniature version of the blue bomber jacket with a 'WATT' patch and blue jeans. The right arm is raised, with the middle finger extended.
objects.relationship: The main subject of the image, standing on a white shelf.
objects.shape_and_color: Rectangular head, humanoid body, predominantly blue and black with white LED details.
objects.texture: Smooth plastic with some textured details on the jacket and jeans.
objects.appearance_details: The LED face is illuminated with a soft white glow, highlighting the angry expression. The jacket has realistic fabric folds.
objects.pose: Standing upright, right arm raised with middle finger extended.
objects.expression: Angry, pixelated face on the LED display.
objects.clothing: Miniature blue bomber jacket with a 'WATT' patch and blue jeans.
objects.orientation: Facing slightly towards the viewer's left.

lighting.direction: Front-lit with subtle fill light from the sides
lighting.shadows: Soft, diffused shadows cast behind the toy on the wall and shelf, indicating a gentle light source.

aesthetics.composition: Centered composition, showcasing the toy as a product. The toy occupies the central vertical axis.

photographic_characteristics.focus: Sharp focus on the toy figure.

structured_prompt.context: This is a product photograph of a collectible toy figure, intended for online retail or a collector's catalog.
